DOC.brief_summary: To describe current treatment practice 12 month previously treat patient diagnose haemophilia A haemophilia B .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-interventional Retrospective Study Current Treatment Practice European Haemophilia Care
DOC.detailed_description: The study population consist patient diagnosis ICD10 : haemophilia A D66.9 haemophilia B D67.9 .
DOC.criteria: Male patient severe moderate haemophilia A haemophilia B . Treatment Factor VIII/Factor IX product initiate least 24 month inclusion study . Informed consent obtain patient patient 's legal representative ( applicable accord legal regulation ) . Confirmed positive inhibitor test detect past 24 month .
